summary: Manufacturing quality control app where employees can report defects (text/photo) on products as they move through departments (cutting, machining, assembly, painting, embossing). Supports multiple products and departments.
architectural_notes: Multi-department workflow: cutting → machining → assembly → painting → embossing
Image upload capability for defect documentation

existing_features.title: Create a frontend form where employees can submit defect reports by entering product name, selecting department from a dropdown (cutting, machining, assembly, painting, embossing), entering defect description, and optionally uploading a photo
Display a list view of all submitted defect reports showing product name, department, description, timestamp, and thumbnail of photo if present, with ability to filter by department
Handle photo uploads by storing image data as static assets in frontend/public/assets/uploads and referencing the filename in the defect report record

Design a clean, professional visual theme for a manufacturing environment with a cohesive color palette (avoiding blue and purple), clear typography for readability in factory settings, and intuitive layout emphasizing quick report submission and easy defect tracking

new_feature_requests.summary: Employee defect reporting with text and photo upload
Support for multiple departments (cutting, machining, assembly, painting, embossing)

Create a backend data model to store defect reports with fields: unique ID, product name, department (cutting/machining/assembly/painting/embossing), defect description text, optional photo reference, employee identifier, and timestamp
Implement backend endpoints to create new defect reports, retrieve all reports, and filter reports by department or product
